subject: Tennis
Women and Girls
Threats and Threatening Messages
Stalking (Crime)
lead_paragraph: More than two decades after Monica Seles was stabbed on the court by a fan of one of her rivals, overly aggressive fans remain a problem with no easy solution for several players on the WTA Tour.
snippet: More than two decades after Monica Seles was stabbed on the court by a fan of one of her rivals, overly aggressive fans remain a problem with no easy solution for several players on the WTA Tour.
